Plot: When a retired engineer is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.
Title: Space Cowboys
Actors: Clint Eastwood, Tommy Lee Jones, Donald Sutherland, James Garner
tomatoConsensus: While the plot is overly cliched, the suberb acting by the stars (especially the tense interactions between Clint Eastwood and Tommy Lee Jones) and the spectacular special effects make this a movie worth seeing.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 6 nominations.
